DOC.brief_summary: Anxiety depression find significant co-occurring condition cancer patient . This study examine psychological condition patient diagnose cholangiocarcinoma , rare cancer bile duct , average survival time three six month post-diagnosis . Participants teach EFT telephone internet group coach session , access online support forum . They complete Mini-Mental Adjustment Cancer Scale ( Mini-MAC ) , EORTC Quality Life scale , PTSD checklist , Patient Health Questionnaire , brief health checklist . Participants also provide medical record confirm diagnosis , marker , study . The study expect enroll 20-15 cholangiocarcinoma patient , use within-subjects , time series , repeated measure design . Symptoms assess prior coach , four , eight weekly coaching session . Follow-ups occur one month , three month , one year . It hypothesize drop severity co-occurring psychological symptom , pain insomnia may occur EFT coaching .
DOC.brief_title: Anxiety Depression Levels Cancer Patients After Self-Application EFT ( Emotional Freedom Techniques )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis cholangiocarcinoma Ability complete form attend phone coaching session
